sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action executes a Job on the Jenkins Server.

Inputs:

  • Job Path - Name of the job to be build. Provide full path in case the job is under a folder. E.g. development-job/Jpetstore_v1.0.
  • Job Parameters - Provide build parameters if your job is configured to build with several parameters. E.g. id=123,verbosity=high.

    • Outputs:

    • Queue ID - Will be set to queue id of the job.
    • Status - Will be set to “Success" if the request succeeds or “Error" if a failure occurs.
    • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

    Error Messages:

    • The requested job doesn't exist or inaccessible.
    • Invalid username or password/token.
    • Provided job parameters are incorrect.
    • Job Parameters are missing. This job is configured with Parameters so requires to provide parameters.
    • No valid CSRF Token was included in the request.
    • You do not have enough permissions to perform this action on Jenkins.
    • The Jenkins server is being restarted.
    • Provided job parameters are incorrect.

    To use this action, the corresponding Jenkins connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jenkins Connection & Credential alias.

    Disclaimer:Jenkins and Jenkins logo are a registered trademark of Jenkins.

    Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action executes a Job on the Jenkins Server.

Inputs:

  • Job Path - Name of the job to be build. Provide full path in case the job is under a folder. E.g. development-job/Jpetstore_v1.0.
  • Job Parameters - Provide build parameters if your job is configured to build with several parameters. E.g. id=123,verbosity=high.

    • Outputs:

    • Queue ID - Will be set to queue id of the job.
    • Status - Will be set to “Success" if the request succeeds or “Error" if a failure occurs.
    • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".

    Error Messages:

    • The requested job doesn't exist or inaccessible.
    • Invalid username or password/token.
    • Provided job parameters are incorrect.
    • Job Parameters are missing. This job is configured with Parameters so requires to provide parameters.
    • No valid CSRF Token was included in the request.
    • You do not have enough permissions to perform this action on Jenkins.
    • The Jenkins server is being restarted.
    • Provided job parameters are incorrect.

    To use this action, the corresponding Jenkins connection and credential must be created and associated with the Jenkins Connection & Credential alias.

    Disclaimer:Jenkins and Jenkins logo are a registered trademark of Jenkins.

    Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
